main event: An observer in Winston Salem, North Carolina reported repeated sightings of a glowing disc-shaped object measuring about 20 ft by 30 ft, which changed colors and had no windows.
interesting points: The glowing object changed colors between red, white, and green., The observer noted repeated sightings over the last three months., The sightings occurred just before dawn with a duration of around 15 seconds., The observers were 6th grade students who had been discussing UFOs in class., A local TV interviewed the observers and teachers about the sightings.
witness description: 6th grade students in a classroom setting
